channel.title: How illiterate were you?
channel.description:
I was going over some old posts I have made on all the websites I have contributed to and have realised I was illiterate as fook, check this out for example:
[quote="✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:12, topic:380049"]actually yer it was coz its pink[/quote]
[quote="✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:24, topic:377972"]Huh aint i rite^^^^[/quote]
I spoke very good England back in the days.

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

I like you Lin.

I have near-perfect grammar, however I’ve always had one question. When you’re trying to say the plural of something which cannot be typed as it is mainly phonetic (like the plural of s, ss? s’s?), how is it typed?

Edit:

ANSWER!:

Apostrophes are used to form plurals of letters that appear in lowercase; here the rule appears to be more typographical than grammatical, e.g. "three ps" versus "three p's." To form the plural of a lowercase letter, place 's after the letter. There is no need for apostrophes indicating a plural on capitalized letters, numbers, and symbols (though keep in mind that some editors, teachers, and professors still prefer them). Here are some examples: [b]p's and q's[/b] [b]Ps and Qs[/b]
Source: http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/621/01/

Read full topic

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:1, topic:283189”]I’ve been browsing these forums enough and this pissing me off. First off, let me show you what an apostrophe is.

’

Amazing isn’t it? Now, these are its TWO, AND ONLY TWO PURPOSES (As I know of):

-To show ownership (Lin’s something)
-To take place of removed characters (Don’t)

Here’s an example of where you shouldn’t (Hey look, a proper apostrophe!) use one:
“Array’s”
I saw that in the tutorial section. Why? Why is it there? There’s no ownership being given to it, and no letters missing from the original word. It’s not needed. It’s annoying and improper grammar. Using no apostrophes is better than using one where they’re not needed.

Good
The building’s windows are clean.
Don’t do that, please.

Bad
A Lesson on Apostrophe’s

The sad thing is I need to post this, when you were learned about them in the 1st Grade for all you Amerikanz. It’s rare for me to post two topics in around an hour in the same board, but I seriously got angry when constantly seeing it.

But seriously. Stop adding apostrophes when not supposed to. It makes you look like an idiot.

~Lin[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

This, from about five years ago. I typed in title case for ages.

This Is A Funny Little Extra That Microsoft Included With Access 2000. It Will ONLY WORK WITH Access 2000.

1: Open A New Database With Access 2000
2: Create A New Macro
3: Dont Do Anything, Just Immediately Save It As “Magic Eight Ball” (case sensitive, dont include the qoutations)
4: Close The Macro
5: Droag The Macro On To The Tool Bar

Notice Anything? The Macro Icon Has Turned To An Eight Ball! Ask A Question Out Loud And Then Click On It!

Hope You Enjoy Using It!

Read full topic

I need help with a few things:

First off, where are all those files such as NPCDef.xml and NPCs.rscd?

How do I get range and mage to work? Please, just get me started. I’d like to learn and be helped.

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

Today I couldn’t speak… I tried saying the word Superficiality. rofl had a good laugh.

What an awkward sense of humor …-_-
Why do I feel like people in this topic are sanctimonious and pretentious. Trying to spew a bunch of vocab to show their intelligence. This talk is gratuitous and superfluous. I’m feeling so ebullient. Hahahahaahahaha. Like the other day I tried to pronounce verisimilitude I pronounced it like ver simla tewde
When it’s supposed to be like ver samila tuude. How silly I had a good laugh.
Why I remember the other day I tried to read othello but it was sad at some parts that I felt lugubrious. Man that was silly <— I’m such a funny person haha.
… Not…
Like I totally did not try hard to type some big words, haha silly people
People are so silly

xx matty xx:

this topic is lame

Read full topic

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:37, topic:525806”][quote author=Whackatre link=topic=473010.msg3459042#msg3459042 date=1294304382]
some weapons i have recently added do not fit the player’s hand in my client. for example, they would just stay there, and when the player attacks an npc, they would just punch it barehanded, with the weapon staying still right beside them. how do i fix this?

whac
[/quote]
orly.

Whac the shift key if the one to the extreme left of your Z key. You are welcome.[/quote]

i’ve dug through my old posts and found that as time passed, i gradually reduced my frequency of capitalization. i guess that post, along with a few others, is an exception.

Read full topic

item.title: How illiterate were you?
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

@chilwit, Read the OP, no matter how far back in English you go, that will still seem illiterate.

I wasn’t trying to be literate. I don’t get you plan to go with this thread
In case you didn’t notice some of the english grammar cases i was trying to make abit noticeable was
you and one, breaking up my dependent clauses etc.

but what are you trying to showcase here? that you are super literate now?
This is why I hate grammar Nazis
I like funny and false grammar. There is no point to correct improper grammar in non formal posts such as forum posts.
It’s fine to tell them that but using it as a way to show your superiority is pure ignorance.
It is very annoying. It goes something like this
“your stupid and week” and the Nazi has nothing to say
and does “you’re* weak*” then screenshots it and posts it on Reddit or Facebook thinking that the comeback was freaking hilarious
It is stupid. It isn’t cool either. that is why i hate these posts or threads.
Especially when you know the person already knows he accidentally mistyped because of a little rush.
I mean YOU know what they freaking mean.
… but i guess it makes them feel good about themselves.

Read full topic
